name: Email Responder
description: Downloads emails from an IMAP server, generates responses using an LLM, and sends the responses via SMTP.
author: @@eduardosotomontaner.arb-sep-shinkai

response_context.description: Contextual information for the LLM to use when generating responses.

from_date.description: Filter emails received after this date (ISO 8601 format).

table_created.description: Indicates if the answered_emails table was created.

mail_ids.description: List of unique IDs of processed emails.

login_status.description: Status of the email server login.

sqlTables.name: answered_emails
sqlTables.definition:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS answered_emails (
            email_unique_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
            subject TEXT NOT NULL,
            email TEXT NOT NULL,
            response TEXT NOT NULL,
            received_date DATETIME NOT NULL,
            response_date DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
        );
